thread.title: Owner, CEO named as detainees in Bezeq inquiry

title: Owner, CEO named as detainees in Bezeq inquiry
text:
Owner, CEO named as detainees in Bezeq inquiry 8:58am EST - 01:00 
Israeli police revealed on Tuesday they had arrested the controlling shareholder and CEO of the country's biggest telecoms company Bezeq, as well as two former officials with close ties to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, in a corruption case. Kate King reports.
